message.content: {"given_definition_quality":80,"better_definition":"restaurant","sentence":"我们在饭店吃饭。","image_prompt":"A cozy HSK1-level Chinese restaurant with a welcoming sign '饭店' at the entrance, several happy people sitting at simple tables inside, eating rice and drinking tea.
